Living rooms typically contain furniture such as sofas, chairs, tables, coffee tables, bookshelves, television sets, and other items for entertainment and display. They may also contain items such as rugs, carpets, curtains, and other decorative objects.

A living room typically contains furniture such as couches, chairs, coffee tables, end tables, bookshelves, entertainment centers, and other pieces. It may also contain decorations such as artwork, plants, rugs, and lamps.
